snippet: WILKS--Richard, of Albuquerque, NM, died June 7 at the age of 85. He is survived by his wife of 60 years Sandra, sons Jono and Matt, brother Donald and six grandchildren. Born in Newark, graduated from Weequahic High, in Navy three years during Korea. He received scholarships to Antioch and University of Chicago Law. He practiced law in Phoenix and was counsel to the Pima Indian community. Richard was active in civil rights, argued in front of the Supreme Court and was McGovern's campaign manager. He practiced law but served under justice and fought hard for people less fortunate. There was a military service conducted by the US Navy at the Santa Fe National Cemetery. 1/3
